SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (Version 4.13) Release Notes

Provide your merchandisers and admins with more tools for managing your product catalog and storefront metadata with greater efficiency. Apply important security and behavior enhancements that keep your storefront secure, compliant, and running smoothly.

Upgrade to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (Version 4.13)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) introduces changes that potentially affect your storefront's shopping cart, checkout workflow, and Experience Builder site pages that show B2B Commerce content. This release modifies the required sharing rules for some B2B Commerce for Visualforce custom objects, and includes multiple new storefront configuration settings that can affect compatibility with your existing setup. To make sure that your org and storefronts accommodate the latest options and requirements, complete the following upgrade steps.
Cart: Scale Your Storefront's Capabilities
Elevate your storefront's path to purchase with new efficiency tools that support buyers who build and maintain carts that contain a significant number of items.
Checkout: Deliver an Efficient Buyer Experience
Add powerful checkout capabilities to your customized or headless storefront experience. Give your buyers confidence that their large carts can be placed efficiently and fulfilled successfully.
Lightning Components: Create a Unified B2B Commerce for Visualforce Buyer Experience
Further integrate your fully featured Visualforce storefront with an Experience Builder site, and deliver a smooth transitional experience for your buyers across your solution. The B2B Commerce Header component for an Experience Builder site is enhanced with new content and functionality that provide continuity and parity across your Visualforce and Experience Builder assets.
Trust: Keep Your Storefront Secure and Reliable
Keep your storefront, Experience Cloud site, and org up to date with the latest measures to protect against unauthorized access. Ensure that your storefront continues to provide a smooth, engaging, and intuitive experience for buyers.
Admin Experience: Support Your Storefront's Requirements with Fewer Obstacles
Deliver your organization's fully realized storefront solution and spend less energy working around technical limitations. This release enhances support for some default features to make them easier to implement and maintain.
Developer Experience: Maintain and Extend Your Storefront Code More Reliably
Implement your solution's extensions or customizations with less noise and deeper integration between the B2B Commerce for Visualforce managed package and the Salesforce Platform.
Other Fixes in B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (Version 4.13)
Have confidence that the issues related to performance or buyer experience that you've reported are resolved appropriately. This release includes several fixes that resulted from your submitted cases.
Patch Notes for B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (Version 4.13)
Several patch releases are available for maintaining existing implementations of B2B Commerce Winter ’21 (version 4.13). Some patches contain fixes that require manual upgrade steps. Each patch release is also cumulative, and contains all the fixes from previous B2B Commerce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) patches. When you install a particular patch build, complete any required upgrade steps for all patches that precede the patch you're installing.

title: Upgrading B2B Commerce for Visualforce
